name: Laro
description: The Crypto currency Response to Reversing the Effects of Climate Change. Laro is a global initiative dedicated to developing an array of different programs to combat global warming and climate change. In Laro , website user invest their money on cryptocurrency because it is a digital currency that can be used to buy goods and services, but uses an online ledger with strong cryptography to secure online transactions and Laro invests this money on solar energy because Solar energy is a renewable form of energy and a readily available form of energy. By using solar energy we get Solar energy for battery charging, Solar energy for cooking, Solar energy for houses, Solar water heater, Solar energy for industries.
